Literature Review: Computational fluid dynamics (CFD) has become an indispensable tool in the aerospace industry, revolutionizing the design and analysis of aircraft. Over the past several decades, CFD has been increasingly used to optimize aircraft performance, reduce drag, and improve fuel efficiency. This review aims to provide an overview of the CFD application process, highlighting its importance within the industry and discussing the challenges and opportunities that lie ahead.
